jalse

Interface JALSE

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ActionEngine, ActionScheduler<JALSE>, EntityContainer, Identifiable, Taggable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    DefaultJALSE

    public interface JALSE
extends Identifiable, ActionEngine, ActionScheduler<JALSE>, EntityContainer, Taggable
    JALSE is the overall parent container and engine for each simulation. It provides the ability to create a number of Entity and execute Action at given intervals.
    See Also:
    DefaultJALSE
